articles.description: Fenerbahce manager Jose Mourinho is banned for four games and fined £35,194 for comments after Monday's game with Galatasaray.
articles.title: Jose Mourinho: Fenerbahce coach given four-match ban for comments after Istanbul derby

articles.description: Ireland's Peter O'Mahony, Conor Murray and Cian Healy will retire from Test rugby at the end of this year's Six Nations.
articles.title: Ireland's Peter O'Mahony, Conor Murray and Cian Healy to retire after Six Nations

articles.description: La Liga president Javier Tebas reports the Premier League champions to the European Commission over sponsorship deals and subsidiary companies
articles.title: Manchester City: La Liga boss Javier Tebas reports club to European Commission

articles.description: Michael Vaughan criticises England's persistence with selecting out-and-out fast bowlers following their 2025 Champions Trophy exit.
articles.title: Michael Vaughan criticises England's over-reliance on fast bowlers

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says he is "really enjoying" his new Ferrari as he sets the second-fastest time on day two of Formula 1 pre-season testing in Bahrain.
articles.title: F12025 pre-season testing: Lewis Hamilton 'really happy' with new Ferrari

articles.description: San Antonio Spurs coach Gregg Popovich announces he will not return to the sidelines this season after he suffered a mild stroke in November.
articles.title: Gregg Popovich: San Antonio Spurs coach will not return this season after stroke

articles.description: Jannik Sinner's nomination for the Laureus World Sportsman of the Year award is withdrawn after he was given a three-month doping ban.
articles.title: Jannik Sinner: Laureus award nomination withdrawn after world number one's doping ban

articles.description: The president of the International Paralympic Committee says he is opposed to "blanket solutions" for transgender participation policies.
articles.title: International Paralympic Committee president Andrew Parsons opposed to 'blanket' transgender bans
